i love all sorts of fresh vegetables.

participant_2.background:
I wake up early to make breakfast for my children.
I used to drink chocolate milk shakes with my friends on hot summer days.
my mother is a ballet dancer.
i can never decide between a chili corn dog and a cheesy hot dog.
I just finished baking a batch of my famous chocolate chip cookies for my family.

content.text: I'm doing well! Just finished baking a batch of my famous chocolate chip cookies for my family.
Oh wow, how fun! I love chocolate chip cookies.
Thanks! Me too, they're my favorite.
What's your favorite thing to do with your family?
I love to cook with them, we always have a lot of fun.
That's great! I love cooking too, but I don't get to do it as often as I'd like.
Yeah, it's a great way to spend time together.
What do you do for work?
I'm a teacher, I love working with kids.
That's awesome! I've always thought about being a teacher, but I'm not sure I'm brave enough.
It's definitely not for everyone, but it's a really rewarding job.
I'm sure it is, I'm impressed!
Thanks! I'm glad I could chat with you, it's always nice to meet new people.
You too! I hope you have a great day!
